mapper.insert: insert into app_symp_board (symp_title, symp_cont1, symp_cont2, serial) values(#{title}, #{pain}, #{another}, #{serial})
mapper.select:
select b.symp_no as no, b.symp_title as title, b.symp_date as createdDate, b.symp_cont1 as pain, b.symp_cont2 as another from app_symp_board b
where b.symp_title like(concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) or b.symp_cont1 like(concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))

select b.symp_no as no, b.symp_title as title, b.serial as serial, b.symp_date as createdDate, b.symp_cont1 as pain, b.symp_cont2 as another from app_symp_board b
where b.symp_no = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE app_symp_board b SET b.symp_title=#{title}, b.symp_cont1=#{pain}, b.symp_cont2=#{another} WHERE symp_no=#{no};
mapper.select:
select b.symp_no as no, b.symp_title as title, b.serial as serial, b.symp_date as createdDate, b.symp_cont1 as pain, b.symp_cont2 as another from app_symp_board b
where b.serial = #{serial}

select b.symp_no as no, b.symp_title as title, b.serial as serial, b.symp_date as createdDate, b.symp_cont1 as pain, b.symp_cont2 as another from app_symp_board b
where b.p_no = #{no}
